sentences.sentence: The value of India, China and America increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.
There is an unusual rise in 2011 of India.
China has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013.

sentences.sentence: The value of India, China and America increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2013.
There is an unusual rise in 2011 of India.
China has the lowest average value of 2010, 2011, 2012 and 2013.
